about.details:
Incorporated in 1996, Chemcrux Enterprises Ltd (CEL) is an ISO 9001:2008 and ISO 14001:2004 certified company, engaged in high pressure Oxidation, Chlorosulfonation, Nitration and Aceylation forb manufacturing of intermediates for bulk drugs, dyes and pigments.

Comapany is also exports its products to Europe, Egypt and United States of America. It also caters to customers with tailor made products. CE's major selling products are Lassamide, various Chloro Benzoic acids and Nitro Benzoic acids.

contactDetails.full_address: Chemcrux Enterprises Ltd, T-7 National Plaza, R.C. Dutt Road, Vadodara - 390007

faqs.question: What is the Chemcrux Enterprises IPO?
faqs.answer:
Chemcrux Enterprises IPO is a SME IPO of 1336000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹2.40 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹18 per share. The minimum order quantity is 8000.

The IPO opens on March 15, 2017, and closes on March 20, 2017.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Chemcrux Enterprises IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Chemcrux Enterprises IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Chemcrux Enterprises IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Chemcrux Enterprises IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Chemcrux Enterprises IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Chemcrux Enterprises IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Chemcrux Enterprises IPO opens on March 15, 2017 and closes on March 20, 2017.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Chemcrux Enterprises IPO?
faqs.answer: Chemcrux Enterprises IPO lot size is 8000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,44,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Chemcrux Enterprises IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Chemcrux Enterprises IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
